import React,{useEffect, useState} from 'react' const Video = () => { const [value,setValue]=useState(false); const stop=()=>{ const marquee=document.getElementById("marquee"); if(value===false){ marquee.start(); setValue(true) } else if(value===true){ marquee.stop(); setValue(false) } } useEffect(()=>{ const marquee=document.getElementById("marquee"); marquee.stop(); },[]) return (
